mapper.insert: insert into ORDERS(ORD_CD, CLI_CD, USER_ID, PRO_CD, ORD_VOL, ORD_DATE, ORD_DUE_DATE, ORD_INFO_STATUS, ORD_PAY_DATE) values(#{ord_cd}, #{cli_cd}, #{user_id}, #{pro_cd},#{ord_vol}, #{ord_date}, #{ord_due_date}, #{ord_info_status},#{ord_pay_date})

insert into CONTRACT(CON_CD, CLI_CD, PRO_CD, CON_VOL, CON_DATE, CON_DUE_DATE, CON_INFO_STATUS, CON_PAY_DATE) values(#{con_cd}, #{cli_cd}, #{pro_cd},#{con_vol}, #{con_date}, #{con_due_date}, #{con_info_status},#{con_pay_date})
mapper.select:
select o.*, c.*, p.* from ORDERS o join PRODUCT p on o.pro_cd = p.pro_cd join CLIENT c on c.cli_cd = o.cli_cd
o.ORD_CD like concat('%', #{ord_cd}, '%')
and p.PRO_NAME like concat('%', #{pro_name}, '%')
and c.CLI_NAME like concat ('%', #{cli_name}, '%')

select c.*, cl.*, p.* from CONTRACT c join PRODUCT p on c.pro_cd = p.pro_cd join CLIENT cl on c.cli_cd = cl.cli_cd
c.CON_CD like concat('%', #{con_cd}, '%')
and p.PRO_NAME like concat('%', #{pro_name}, '%')
and cl.CLI_NAME like concat ('%', #{cli_name}, '%')

select o.ORD_CD "ord_cd", p.PRO_NAME "pro_name", c.CLI_NAME "cli_name", o.ORD_VOL "ord_vol",p.PRO_PRICE "pro_price",USER_ID "user_id", o.ORD_DATE "ord_date",o.ORD_DUE_DATE "ord_due_date",p.PRO_VOL "pro_vol",o.ORD_INFO_STATUS "ord_info_status" from ORDERS o join PRODUCT p on o.pro_cd = p.pro_cd join CLIENT c on c.cli_cd = o.cli_cd
order by ORD_CD desc

select c.CON_CD "con_cd",p.PRO_NAME "pro_name",cl.CLI_NAME "cli_name",c.CON_VOL "con_vol",p.PRO_PRICE "pro_price",USER_ID "user_id", c.CON_DATE "con_date",c.CON_DUE_DATE "con_due_date",p.PRO_VOL "pro_vol",c.CON_INFO_STATUS "con_info_status" from CONTRACT c join PRODUCT p on c.pro_cd = p.pro_cd join CLIENT cl on c.cli_cd = cl.cli_cd
order by CON_CD desc
SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(CON_CD, '[^0-9]', '') AS numbers_only FROM CONTRACT ORDER BY numbers_only DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(ORD_CD, '[^0-9]', '') AS numbers_only FROM ORDERS ORDER BY numbers_only DESC LIMIT 1
